name: Malagai Legends
description:
This is a fan PC remake of Answer Software's Atari 2600 game Malagai. We had released Malagai Legends at Atari Age (https://www.atariage.com/) in 2003 to commemorate the game's 20th Anniversary, and it received a moderate response (for what it was). We are not the original creators, but rather a couple of fans who paid tribute to an underrated classic.

This game contains the original Malagai Legends game as an executable (.exe) file and a manual. Please consult Readme.txt contained in this release for instructions on how to play.

Credits

Design: Tyler Wright

Programming: Dylan Wright

Art: Tyler Wright

Music: Jordan Chewning

Manual: Tyler Wright, with a few excerpts from the original Malagai manual.

Gamemaker Engine: Mark Overmars

Very Special Thanks: 

Answer Software

and

Atari Age (http://www.atariage.com)
